title: Maureen O'Sullivan
summary: Maureen O'Sullivan (17 May 1911 â€“ 23 June 1998) was an Irish-American actress, best known for playing Jane in the Tarzan series of films during the era of Johnny Weissmuller. She was the mother of actress Mia Farrow.  She acted the role of mother to Farrow's character in Hannah and Her Sisters and performed with such actors as Laurence Olivier, Greta Garbo and Myrna Loy. In 2020, she was listed at number eight on The Irish Times list of Ireland's greatest film actors.[1]
